resources.string: Real Subject - These responses will be analyzed for publication.
Full Address (e.g. 555 Front St., Toronto, Ontario, Canada N1N 5A5)
1. Tell me about any of your close relatives (parents, brothers, sisters, or children) that have suffered from any of the following conditions. Please check all that apply.
2. Tell me about any of your diagnoses or symptoms of any of the following. Please check all that apply.
3. Please indicate if you are taking any medications for the following conditions and how long you have been taken medications? Please check all that apply.
4. How many drinks of alcohol on average per week do you consume? (glass of wine, or 12 oz beer, or 1 oz liquor = one drink).
6. If you are a current smoker or have smoked in the past how many cigarettes per day do you or did you smoke?
7. How many years have you or did you smoke?

8. How many times per week, for at least twenty minutes per activity, do you take part in moderate physical activity for work, around the house or sports? Examples of moderate physical activities are delivering mail, house painting, making deliveries, lifting and carrying light objects, raking the lawn, volleyball, ping-pong, bowling, brisk walking.
9. How many times per week, for at least twenty minutes per activity, do you take part in strenuous physical activity that cause sweating or breathlessness?
10. I am going to make a statement about you. Tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with the following: Your memory has changed significantly from a year ago.
11. I am going to make another statement about you. Tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with the following: There have been significant changes in your ability to handle money from a year ago.

12. I am going to make another statement about you. Tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with the following: There have been significant changes in your ability to play games of skill from a year ago such as chess, checkers, crossword puzzles, backgammon, bingo etc.
13A. Over the last two weeks I have felt cheerful and in good spirits:
13B. Over the last two weeks I have felt active and vigorous:
14. What is your year of birth?
23. How often have you used previously used a computer, Smartphone, personal digital assistant or similar devices
24. Have you taken the Montreal Cognitive Assessment in the last thirty days?
Heart disease (coronary, congestive heart failure, peripheral vascular disease, atrial fibrillation, left ventricular hypertrophy).
